quote_first: “By the bye,” said the first, “I was able this morning to telegraph the very words of the order to my cousin at
quote_last: .” “And I sent it to the Daily Telegraph at thirteen minutes past ten."n "Bravo, Mr. Blount!” “Very good, M. Jolivet.” “I will try and match that!"
title: Michel Strogoff
author: Jules Verne
